about_the_game:
Start your engines! Purchase the Kawasaki Pack and experience real off-road riding!

This pack includes the following vehicles:

  • 2023/2024 Kawasaki KX250 MX
  • 2023/2024 Kawasaki KX450 MX
  • 2014 Kawasaki KFX450R ATV
  • 2020 Kawasaki Teryx KRX 1000 UTV
detailed_description:
Start your engines! Purchase the Kawasaki Pack and experience real off-road riding!
